info.name: UTS IAE - Food Delivery Microservices [FULL CRUD]
info.description: Koleksi API LENGKAP dengan semua operasi CRUD (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) untuk proyek Microservices Food Delivery.

item.name: 1. AUTHENTICATION
item.description:
Untuk mendapatkan Token JWT dengan role-based access.

**Available Roles:**
- `admin`: Full CRUD access (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) to all services
- `user`: Read-only access (GET only) to all services

**Login Credentials:**
- Admin: username=`admin`, password=`admin123`
- User: username=`rizky`, password=`user123`

item.description:

**Error Example (400 Bad Request):**
```json
{
    "error": "Username already exists"
}
```
